statements: SELECT * FROM RentalProperties;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address FROM RentalProperties;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address, maintenance_request_id FROM RentalProperties WHERE maintenance_request_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM RentalProperties ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM RentalProperties WHERE task_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM RentalProperties WHERE maintenance_request_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RentalProperties WHERE task_id = 5 AND maintenance_request_id = 10;
SELECT property_name, property_address, task_description FROM RentalProperties WHERE maintenance_request_id > 5 AND task_id < 10 ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties FROM RentalProperties;
SELECT DISTINCT property_address FROM RentalProperties WHERE maintenance_request_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_status = 'Open';
SELECT request_description, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM management_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_due_date DESC;
SELECT task_description, task_assigned_to FROM management_tasks WHERE property_id = 54321;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_status='Pending' ORDER BY request_id DESC;
SELECT request_id, property_id, request_date, request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY request_date ASC;
SELECT task_id, property_id, task_description, task_assigned_to, task_due_date FROM management_tasks WHERE task_status='Incomplete' ORDER BY task_due_date ASC;
SELECT property_id, COUNT(request_id) as total_requests FROM maintenance_requests GROUP BY property_id;
SELECT property_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(task_due_date, CURRENT_DATE())) as avg_days_to_complete FROM management_tasks GROUP BY property_id ORDER BY avg_days_to_complete DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRequests;
SELECT property_id, request_date, request_description FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE property_id = 123;
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_due_date FROM PropertyManagementTasks WHERE task_due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address FROM RentalProperties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE request_description LIKE '%plumbing%';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM RentalProperties ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT task_description, task_due_date FROM PropertyManagementTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM RentalProperties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' AND property_address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT property_id, request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT property_id FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_status FROM management_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address FROM rental_properties WHERE property_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, request_date, request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_status FROM management_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM rental_properties WHERE property_size > 1000 ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT manager_name, manager_phone FROM property_managers WHERE manager_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRequests;
SELECT request_description, request_date FROM MaintenanceRequests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, request_description FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT emp_name, emp_position FROM Employees WHERE emp_position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE property_type IN ('Residential', 'Commercial') ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE property_id = 123;
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE request_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ManagementTasks WHERE task_assigned_to = 'John Doe' AND task_due_date > '2022-03-15';
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM ManagementTasks WHERE property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment');
SELECT emp_name, emp_position FROM Employees WHERE emp_contact LIKE '%@company.com';
